snippet: Islamic State fighters are blending in with disenfranchised Sunni populations in some Iraqi cities near the capital, Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said.
lead_paragraph: Islamic State fighters are blending in with disenfranchised Sunni populations in some Iraqi cities near the capital, Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said.

headline.main: Obama’s Top Military Adviser Warns of Possible ISIS Attacks in Baghdad
